Description:

Over Middle darkness thickens . Fate of elves, dwarves and humans depend on whether the Commonwealth will be able to destroy the One Ring in the fire of Mount Doom , and thus overthrow of Sauron , the lord of darkness ... Since the release of Rivendell Commonwealth continuously exposed to hazards. Nazgul , the spies of Saruman , the storm on Caradhras , hordes of orcs, fearsome Balrog , against which the great magician Gandalf fell ... Any of these tests would be enough to break the very strong will , but members of the Commonwealth have remained true to its purpose. After the death of Boromir The Commonwealth was divided. Aragorn , Legolas and Gimli were in Fangorn forest , where they were met Gandalf miraculously returned to the living world . From there they went to Rohan , where they took part in the battle against the army of the traitor Saruman mage . Frodo and Sam as a couple went to the east to Mordor - the only place in Middle-earth , where it is possible to destroy the Ring . Meanwhile in Mordor shrink more and more new army of orcs, trolls and the people of Darkness. All this power is about to come crashing down on Gondor - the last bastion of free people of Middle Earth . Gandalf , Aragorn , Legolas and Gimli are independently sent to the capital of Gondor Minas Tirith Gondor ... dwell there ? Does Frodo fulfill its mission ? It depends only on you!
